resources.string: Error: Couldn\'t write files. Please try a different storage location.
An error occurred with hardware acceleration. Would you like to disable it and try again?
An error occurred during the retrieval of the video. This could be due to network issues or YouTube protocols. Please try again later.
Are you sure you want to leave the video player? %s will stop playing.
The video player encountered a serious error. The video file could not be opened and/or played. The format was not recognised.

Your Acceptance

 By using the 'JustSeed TIME' app you signify your agreement to (1) these terms and conditions (the 'Terms of Service').

 Privacy Policy

 You understand that by using 'JustSeed TIME' you may encounter material that you may deem to be offensive, indecent, or objectionable, and that such content may or may not be identified as having explicit material.  LIMITATION OF LIABILITY

UNDER NO CIRCUMSTANCES WILL 'JustSeed TIME' BE LIABLE FOR ANY LOSS OR DAMAGE, INCLUDING PERSONAL INJURY OR DEATH, RESULTING FROM YOUR USE OF 'JustSeed TIME'.

SOURCE MATERIAL

ALL MOVIES ARE NOT HOSTED IN ANY SERVER AND ARE STREAMED USING THE P2P BIT TORRENT PROTOCOL. ALL MOVIES ARE PULLED IN FROM THE OPEN PUBLIC APIS. BY WATCHING A MOVIE WITH THIS APPLICATION YOU MIGHT BE COMMITING COPYRIGHT VIOLATIONS DEPENDING ON YOUR COUNTRY'S LAWS. WE DO NOT TAKE ANY RESPONSABILITIES.

 Ability to Accept Terms of Service

 By using 'JustSeed TIME' or accessing this site you affirm that you are either more than 18 years of age, or an emancipated minor, or possess legal parental or guardian consent, and are fully able and competent to enter into the terms, conditions, obligations, affirmations, representations, and warranties set forth in these Terms of Service, and to abide by and comply with these Terms of Service. In any case, you affirm that you are over the age of 13, as the Service is not intended for children under 13. If you are under 13 years of age, then please do not use the Service. There are lots of other great web sites for you. Talk to your parents about what sites are appropriate for you.
Restart application for changes to take effect
YUV: best performance but does not always work
You can only stream videos over Wi-Fi. You can disable this in preferences if you want to stream over a cellular connection.

Popcorn Time is the result of many developers and designers putting a bunch of APIs together to make the experience of watching torrent movies as simple as possible.\n\nWe are an open source project. We are from all over the world. We love our movies. And boy, do we love popcorn.
The video could not play on your beaming device. Would you like to try again? The app might need to download more parts before your device is able to play the video.
You need to have the VPN.ht app installed to use the VPN option from inside Popcorn Time. Not interested? Then you can just hide this button.
